member.name: MEM_EXTENDED_PARAMETER_TYPE
member.summary: Defines values for extended parameters used for file mapping into an address space.

member.name: MEM_EXTENDED_PARAMETER_TYPE.MemExtendedParameterAddressRequirements
member.summary: This extended parameter type is used to specify alignment and virtual address range restrictions for new memory allocations created by and .

member.name: MEM_EXTENDED_PARAMETER_TYPE.MemExtendedParameterNumaNode
member.summary: This extended parameter type is used to specify the preferred NUMA node for new memory allocations created by and .
